column4: so from what I gather from the forms, it seems that the firefox for hoary now is 1.0.2 with security patches applied
but is it as secure as 1.0.6
you could always just install inside /opt
that's correct. if you read the security notes, it has the patches from 1.0.3, 1.0.4 and 1.0.5. 1.0.6 just was a bugfix release to fix the API changes from 1.0.5
